## ðŸŒŸ What is this?
**OrbitWebTools Humanizer** is an open-source web tool designed to convert robotic AI text (generated by ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Jasper) into natural, human-like writing. 

Unlike other tools (StealthWriter, Quillbot) that charge money or limit you to 200 words, this tool runs entirely in your browser and allows **Unlimited Conversions for Free**.

## ðŸŽ¯ Key Features
- **âœ… No Login Required:** Just open and use. No signup.
- **âœ… Unlimited Words:** Paste 500 or 5000 words, it handles everything.
- **âœ… Bypass AI Detection:** Optimized to beat Turnitin, ZeroGPT, GPTZero, and Originality.ai.
- **âœ… Privacy First:** Runs on Client-Side JavaScript. Your text never leaves your browser.
- **âœ… Mobile App Support:** Installable as a PWA on Android & iOS.

## ðŸ› ï¸ How It Works
Our algorithm uses a **Dynamic Synonym Replacement Engine**. It scans the text for "AI-typical" words (like *moreover, delve, crucial*) and replaces them with more natural, conversational alternatives while maintaining the original meaning. This lowers the **perplexity** and **burstiness** scores that detectors look for.
